verses.verse: "At the <S%H7093>end<s%> of [every] <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> you shall <S%H6213>grant<s%> a <S%H8059>remission<s%> [of debts.]

"And <S%H2088>this<s%> is the <S%H1697>manner<s%> of <S%H8059>remission:<s%> <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H1167>creditor<s%> <S%H4874><s%> <S%H3027><s%> shall <S%H8058>release<s%> <S%H834>what<s%> he has <S%H5383>loaned<s%> to his <S%H7453>neighbor;<s%> he shall not <S%H5065>exact<s%> it of his <S%H7453>neighbor<s%> and his <S%H251>brother,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> the Lord's <S%H8059>remission<s%> has been <S%H7121>proclaimed.<s%>
"From a <S%H5237>foreigner<s%> you may <S%H5065>exact<s%> [it,] but your <S%H3027>hand<s%> shall <S%H8058>release<s%> <S%H834>whatever<s%> of yours is with your <S%H251>brother.<s%>

<S%H657>"However,<s%> there shall be <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H34>poor<s%> among you, <S%H3588>since<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> will <S%H1288>surely<s%> <S%H1288>bless<s%> you in the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> is <S%H5414>giving<s%> you as an <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> to <S%H3423>possess,<s%>

<S%H518>if<s%> <S%H7534>only<s%> you <S%H8085>listen<s%> <S%H8085>obediently<s%> to the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> to <S%H6213>observe<s%> <S%H6213>carefully<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H4687>commandment<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I am <S%H6680>commanding<s%> you <S%H3117>today.<s%>

"For the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> shall <S%H1288>bless<s%> you as He has <S%H1696>promised<s%> you, and you will <S%H5670>lend<s%> to <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H1471>nations,<s%> but you will not <S%H5670>borrow;<s%> and you will <S%H4910>rule<s%> over <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H1471>nations,<s%> but they will not <S%H4910>rule<s%> over you.

<S%H3588>"If<s%> there is a <S%H34>poor<s%> <S%H34>man<s%> with you, <S%H259>one<s%> of your <S%H251>brothers,<s%> in <S%H259>any<s%> of your <S%H8179>towns<s%> in your <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> is <S%H5414>giving<s%> you, you shall not <S%H553>harden<s%> your <S%H3824>heart,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H7092>close<s%> your <S%H3027>hand<s%> from your <S%H34>poor<s%> <S%H251>brother;<s%>

but you shall <S%H6605>freely<s%> <S%H6605>open<s%> your <S%H3027>hand<s%> to him, and shall <S%H5670>generously<s%> <S%H5670>lend<s%> him <S%H1767>sufficient<s%> for his <S%H4270>need<s%> [in] <S%H834>whatever<s%> he <S%H2637>lacks.<s%>

<S%H8104>"Beware,<s%> <S%H6435>lest<s%> there is a <S%H1100>base<s%> <S%H1697>thought<s%> in your <S%H3824>heart,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> 'The <S%H7651>seventh<s%> <S%H8141>year,<s%> the <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H8059>remission,<s%> is <S%H7126>near,<s%>' and your <S%H5869>eye<s%> is <S%H7489>hostile<s%> toward your <S%H34>poor<s%> <S%H251>brother,<s%> and you <S%H5414>give<s%> him <S%H3808>nothing;<s%> then he may <S%H7121>cry<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> you, and it will be a <S%H2399>sin<s%> in you.

"You shall <S%H5414>generously<s%> <S%H5414>give<s%> to him, and your <S%H3824>heart<s%> shall not be <S%H7489>grieved<s%> when you <S%H5414>give<s%> to him, <S%H3588>because<s%> <S%H1558><s%> for <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1697>thing<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> will <S%H1288>bless<s%> you in <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H4639>work<s%> and in <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H3027>undertakings.<s%> <S%H9303><s%>

"For the <S%H34>poor<s%> will <S%H3808>never<s%> <S%H2308>cease<s%> [to be] in the <S%H776>land;<s%> <S%H5921>therefore<s%> <S%H3651><s%> I <S%H6680>command<s%> you, <S%H559>saying,<s%> 'You shall <S%H6605>freely<s%> <S%H6605>open<s%> your <S%H3027>hand<s%> to your <S%H251>brother,<s%> to your <S%H6041>needy<s%> and <S%H6041>poor<s%> in your <S%H776>land.<s%>'

<S%H3588>"If<s%> your <S%H251>kinsman,<s%> a <S%H5680>Hebrew<s%> <S%H5680>man<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H5680>woman,<s%> is <S%H4376>sold<s%> to you, then he shall <S%H5647>serve<s%> you <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H8141>years,<s%> but in the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> you shall <S%H7971>set<s%> him <S%H2670>free.<s%>
"And <S%H3588>when<s%> you <S%H7971>set<s%> him <S%H2670>free,<s%> you shall not <S%H7971>send<s%> him <S%H7971>away<s%> empty-handed.

"You shall <S%H6059>furnish<s%> him <S%H6059>liberally<s%> from your <S%H6629>flock<s%> and from your <S%H1637>threshing<s%> <S%H1637>floor<s%> and from your <S%H3342>wine<s%> <S%H3342>vat;<s%> you shall <S%H5414>give<s%> to him as the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> has <S%H1288>blessed<s%> you.

"And you shall <S%H2142>remember<s%> that you were a <S%H5650>slave<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> and the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H6299>redeemed<s%> you; <S%H5921>therefore<s%> <S%H3651><s%> I <S%H6680>command<s%> you <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>today.<s%>

"And it shall <S%H1961>come<s%> about <S%H3588>if<s%> he <S%H559>says<s%> to you, 'I will not <S%H3318>go<s%> out from you,' <S%H3588>because<s%> he <S%H157>loves<s%> you and your <S%H1004>household,<s%> <S%H3588>since<s%> he fares <S%H2895>well<s%> with you;

then you shall <S%H3947>take<s%> an <S%H4836>awl<s%> and <S%H5414>pierce<s%> it through his <S%H241>ear<s%> into the <S%H1817>door,<s%> and he shall be your <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H5769>forever.<s%> And <S%H637>also<s%> you shall <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H3651>likewise<s%> to your <S%H519>maidservant.<s%>

"It shall not <S%H7185>seem<s%> <S%H7185>hard<s%> to you when you <S%H7971>set<s%> him <S%H2670>free,<s%> for he has <S%H5647>given<s%> you <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> [with] <S%H4932>double<s%> the <S%H7939>service<s%> of a <S%H7916>hired<s%> <S%H7916>man;<s%> so the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> will <S%H1288>bless<s%> you in <S%H3605>whatever<s%> <S%H834><s%> you <S%H6213>do.<s%>

"You shall <S%H6942>consecrate<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3205>first-born<s%> <S%H2145>males<s%> that are born of your <S%H1241>herd<s%> and of your <S%H6629>flock;<s%> you shall not <S%H5647>work<s%> with the first-born of your <S%H7794>herd,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H1494>shear<s%> the first-born of your <S%H6629>flock.<s%>

"You and your <S%H1004>household<s%> shall <S%H398>eat<s%> it <S%H8141>every<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> in the <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H977>chooses.<s%>

"But <S%H3588>if<s%> it <S%H1961>has<s%> any <S%H9249>defect,<s%> [such as] <S%H6455>lameness<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H5787>blindness,<s%> [or] <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H7451>serious<s%> <S%H9249>defect,<s%> you shall not <S%H2076>sacrifice<s%> it to the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God.<s%>
"You shall <S%H398>eat<s%> it within your <S%H8179>gates;<s%> the <S%H2931>unclean<s%> and the <S%H2889>clean<s%> <S%H9191>alike<s%> [may eat it,] as a <S%H6643>gazelle<s%> or a <S%H354>deer.<s%>
<S%H7534>"Only<s%> you shall not <S%H398>eat<s%> its <S%H1818>blood;<s%> you are to <S%H8210>pour<s%> it out on the <S%H776>ground<s%> like <S%H4325>water.<s%>
